title: Why pixel stand charges my pixel 3 slowly ( 6 hours or more) than before was just 2 hours or less
content:
I don't know what happens to my device or to my pixel stand, since I updated to android 11 I noticed my device charges very slowly using pixel stand ( 6 hours or more ) and that wasn't before ... Before my pixel was charging wirelessly using pixel stand just in 2 hours or less ... I don't know what happened??!! And is there any fix or solution to this ? 
I tried to reset settings in pixel stand but with no hope.
Please I need help thanks in advance
